00029    /* 
00030    * Constructor
00031    */
00032    RingOctaRebridgeMove::RingOctaRebridgeMove(McSystem& system) : 
00033       GroupRebridgeBase(system),
00034       speciesId_(-1),
00035       upperBridge_(0),
00036       lowerBridge_(0)
00037    {} 
00038    
00039    /* 
00040    * Read parameters speciesId, and nTrial
00041    */
00042    void RingOctaRebridgeMove::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00043    {
00044       // Read parameters
00045       readProbability(in);
00046       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00047       read<double>(in, "upperBridge", upperBridge_);
00048       read<double>(in, "lowerBridge", lowerBridge_);
00049 
00050       // Use dynamic_cast to check that the Species is actually a Linear species
00051       Ring* ringPtr;
00052       ringPtr = dynamic_cast<Ring*>(&(simulation().species(speciesId_)));
00053     }

00056    /* 
00057    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Monte Carlo move.
00058    *
00059    * A complete move involve the following stepts:
00060    *
00061    *    1) choose a molecule-i randomly;
00062    *    2) find molecule-j of the same type as i, and monomer pairs satisfying
00063    *       the distance criterion exist;
00064    *
00065    */
00066    bool RingOctaRebridgeMove::move() 
00067    {
00068       Molecule *molPtr1;    // pointer to the rebridging molecule
00069       Molecule *molPtr2;    // pointer to the rebridging molecule
00070       Atom     *aPtr, *bPtr, *cPtr, *dPtr; // atom pointers
00071       Atom     *mPtr, *nPtr;               // atom pointers
00072       Vector   swapV;
00073       int      nAtom, ia, ib, ic, id, im, in, molId2;
00074       int      bondType;
00075       double   energy;
00076       bool     found, accept;
00077 
00078       incrementNAttempt();
00079 
00080       // Randomly pick up a molecule.
00081       molPtr1 = &(system().randomMolecule(speciesId_));
00082       nAtom = molPtr1->nAtom();
00083 
00084       // Randomly choose the a atom in the tetra-group.
00085       im = random().uniformInt(0, nAtom);
00086 
00087       // Search the rebriding sites.
00088       found = scanBridge(molPtr1, im, molId2, in);
00089       if (!found) return false;
00090 
00091       ia = modId(im-1, nAtom);
00092       ib = modId(im+1, nAtom);
00093       ic = modId(in-1, nAtom);
00094       id = modId(in+1, nAtom);
00095 
00096       // Calcuate the energy change.
00097       mPtr = &(molPtr1->atom(im));
00098       aPtr = &(molPtr1->atom(ia));
00099       bPtr = &(molPtr1->atom(ib));
00100 
00101       molPtr2 = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, molId2));
00102       cPtr = &(molPtr2->atom(ic));
00103       dPtr = &(molPtr2->atom(id));
00104       nPtr = &(molPtr2->atom(in));
00105 
00106       bondType = molPtr1->bond(im).typeId();
00107       //octaEnergy(aPtr, bPtr, cPtr, dPtr, mPtr, nPtr, bondType, energy);
00108 
00109       energy = 0.0;
00110       energy -= system().atomPotentialEnergy(*mPtr);
00111       energy -= system().atomPotentialEnergy(*nPtr);
00112 
00113       // Swap positions of atoms m and n.
00114       swapV = mPtr->position();
00115 
00116       //system().moveAtom(*mPtr, nPtr->position());
00117       mPtr->position() = nPtr->position();
00118       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00119       system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*mPtr);
00120       #endif
00121 
00122       //system().moveAtom(*nPtr, swapV);
00123       nPtr->position() = swapV;
00124       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00125       system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*nPtr);
00126       #endif
00127 
00128       energy += system().atomPotentialEnergy(*mPtr);
00129       energy += system().atomPotentialEnergy(*nPtr);
00130 
00131       // Decide whether to accept or reject.
00132       accept = random().metropolis(boltzmann(energy));
00133 
00134       if (accept) {
00135          // Increment counter for accepted moves of this class.
00136          incrementNAccept();
00137       } else {
00138          // Swap back bead positions.
00139          swapV = mPtr->position();
00140 
00141          //system().moveAtom(*mPtr, nPtr->position());
00142          mPtr->position() = nPtr->position();
00143          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00144          system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*mPtr);
00145          #endif
00146 
00147          //system().moveAtom(*nPtr, swapV);
00148          nPtr->position() = swapV;
00149          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00150          system().pairPotential().updateAtomCell(*nPtr);
00151          #endif
00152       }
00153 
00154       return accept;
00155    }
00156 
00157    /*
00158    * Return true if the octahedron formed by the 6 closely approaching atoms
00159    * satisfy the 8 distance criterion.
00160    */
00161    bool RingOctaRebridgeMove::
00162    scanBridge(Molecule* molPtr1, int im, int& molId2, int &in)
00163    {
00164       Molecule *molPtr2;
00165       Atom     *pn;
00166       Vector   aPos, bPos, cPos, dPos, mPos, nPos;
00167       int      nAtom, ia, ib, ic, id, dmn, dnm;
00168       int      nNeighbor, j, *idList, *molIdList;
00169       int      molId1, choice, nGroup;
00170       double   lenSq, minSq, maxSq;
00171       bool     validIndex, found;
00172 
00173       // Number of atoms per molecule.
00174       nAtom = molPtr1->nAtom();
00175 
00176       // The a and b Atom id.
00177       ia = modId(im-1, nAtom);
00178       ib = modId(im+1, nAtom);
00179 
00180       aPos = molPtr1->atom(ia).position();
00181       bPos = molPtr1->atom(ib).position();
00182       mPos = molPtr1->atom(im).position();
00183 
00184       // Prepare for the scan.
00185       found = false;
00186       maxSq = upperBridge_ * upperBridge_;
00187       minSq = lowerBridge_ * lowerBridge_;
00188 
00189       // Check the am bond.
00190       lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(aPos, mPos);
00191       if (lenSq >= maxSq || lenSq <= minSq) {
00192          in = -1;       // invalid value
00193          molId2 = -1;   // invalid value
00194          return found;
00195       }
00196 
00197       // Check the mb bond.
00198       lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(mPos, bPos);
00199       if (lenSq >= maxSq || lenSq <= minSq) {
00200          in = -1;       // invalid value
00201          molId2 = -1;   // invalid value
00202          return found;
00203       }
00204 
00205       // Get the neighbor list.
00206       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00207       system().pairPotential().cellList().getNeighbors(mPos, neighbors_);
00208       nNeighbor = neighbors_.size();
00209       idList = new int[nNeighbor];
00210       molIdList = new int[nNeighbor];
00211 
00212       // Loop over neighboring monomers and identify the octa-group.
00213       nGroup = 0;
00214       molId1 = molPtr1->id();
00215       for (j = 0; j < nNeighbor; ++j) {
00216          pn = neighbors_[j];
00217          in = pn->indexInMolecule();
00218          molId2 = pn->molecule().id();
00219 
00220          validIndex = true;
00221 
00222          if (molId2 == molId1) {
00223             // Check if im and in are separated by at least two atoms.
00224             dmn = in - im;
00225             if (dmn < 0) dmn += nAtom;
00226 
00227             dnm = im - in;
00228             if (dnm < 0) dnm += nAtom;
00229 
00230             if (dmn <= 2 && dnm <= 2) validIndex = false;
00231          }
00232 
00233          if (pn->molecule().species().id() != speciesId_)
00234             validIndex = false;
00235 
00236          if (validIndex) {
00237 
00238             molPtr2 = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, molId2));
00239 
00240             ic = modId(in-1, nAtom);
00241             id = modId(in+1, nAtom);
00242 
00243             cPos = molPtr2->atom(ic).position();
00244             dPos = molPtr2->atom(id).position();
00245             nPos = molPtr2->atom(in).position();
00246 
00247             // Distance test.
00248             lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(cPos, mPos);
00249             if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00250 
00251             lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(mPos, dPos);
00252             if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00253 
00254             lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(aPos, nPos);
00255             if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00256 
00257             lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(nPos, bPos);
00258             if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00259 
00260             lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(cPos, nPos);
00261             if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00262 
00263             lenSq = boundary().distanceSq(nPos, dPos);
00264             if (lenSq > minSq && lenSq < maxSq) {
00265 
00266                idList[nGroup] = in; 
00267                molIdList[nGroup] = molId2; 
00268                ++nGroup;
00269 
00270             } } } } } }  // 6 additional distance test
00271 
00272          } // if the atom id "in" is valid
00273 
00274       } // loop over neighbors
00275       #endif
00276 
00277       if (nGroup > 0) {
00278          found = true;
00279          choice = random().uniformInt(0,nGroup);
00280          in = idList[choice];
00281          molId2 = molIdList[choice];
00282       } else {
00283          found = false;
00284          in = -1;         // Invalid value.
00285          molId2 = -1;     // Invalid value.
00286       }
00287 
00288       delete [] molIdList;
00289       delete [] idList;
00290       return found;
00291 
00292    }
00293    
00294 }
